연차연동문서 삭제 경고 메세지:
If you delete a document, it cannot be recovered.
It will also be deleted from documents designated as related documents.
Even if you delete a document linked to annual leave management, the annual leave is not recovered.
The annual leave is restored only when it is deleted after forced return.
Are you sure you want to delete it?
연차연동문서 수정 경고 메세지:
Annual leave usage history cannot be edited.
